name: Out of Control (EcoGames)
description:
Welcome to Out of Control! This game is in development and will be updated frequently with new and exciting features.

In this game, you are a skilled rocket pilot navigating all types of levels. You even get to go into space! Isn't that fun? Dodge astronauts, and debris and geometric shapes! Access your inner piloting skills and navigate your way to victory aka the green pad.

In-Game victory pad Controls:

A or left arrow key: Rotate left

D or right arrow key: Rotate right

Spacebar or W: Thrust
